  • What.
  • Work.

Steven A. R. Dow.

Multidisciplinary
Designer.

I'm a multidisciplinary designer with more than ten years of experience.
I've collaborated with cross-functional teams around the globe designing digital products for companies like Vodafone, T-Mobile, Nokia, ING, TomTom, Suitsupply, and many more.


I do a wide range of work, including product design, UX design, UI design, and front-end development. I'm able to manage all design aspects of a project from start to finish and lead end-to-end user experience projects ranging from single app design to enterprise-scale implementations.

I've been involved in the hiring process and mentoring of team members at companies ranging from small and medium-sized businesses to enterprises scale.


I feel most comfortable working with diverse and multicultural teams, but I'm also effective on my own. I enjoy delivering high-level product strategy and direction as hands-on work, producing high-quality design solutions for both mobile and web applications.

I keep abreast with the latest developments in design and technology. I have a strong attention to detail, alongside the abilities to listen effectively, work as a team, and I'm strong at aligning with stakeholders.

What
others
say.

Steven took significant ownership of the tasks in his area - he clearly communicated his strengths (and weaknesses) leaned into discussions with the customer - did thorough research and came back with solid arguments and clear recommendation.


Steven was a great addition to the team - he quickly caught up to speed with our community product - and I especially liked there was no reluctance to deep dive into new areas for Steven.

Allan Hasgard
Director, Technical Consulting at Salesforce

Steven jumped into our project as a Visual Designer on short notice and delivered with vast speed and professionalism the smartphone app designs for Vodafone's Brand new XONE beta product drivexone.


He Art Directed the branding of the iPhone and Android app and led a small team of three designers. Steven did an excellent job and became an essential part of the agile development team.

Guido Gehlen
Head of IoT Automotive at Vodafone

You are a fantastic designer with the ability to make the user flows smoother and increasing usability. For the client UI/UX was one of the main topics, and we passed with success - You are really good at listening to the customer needs and also your colleagues, and you take the requirements seriously.


The client was a bit nervous in the beginning, but with your politeness and experience, they changed their mind very quickly.

Michael Roehr
Services Program/Project Management - Director at Salesforce
